def char_to_ascii(string):
    return {c: ord(c) for c in set(string) if c.isalpha()} if len(string) else None

def char_to_ascii(s):
    if s: return {c: ord(c) for c in set(s) if c.isalpha()}

def char_to_ascii(s):
    if s: return {c: ord(c) for c in set(s) if c.isalpha()}
char_to_ascii = lambda s: {e:ord(e) for e in set(s) if e.isalpha()} or None

def char_to_ascii(string):
    return {c:ord(c) for c in string if c.isalpha()} or None

def char_to_ascii(stg):
    return {c: ord(c) for c in set(stg) if c.isalpha()} if stg else None

def char_to_ascii(string):
    return { c: ord(c) for c in set(string) if c.isalpha() } if len(string) > 0 else None
char_to_ascii = lambda s: None if len(s) == 0 else {c: ord(c) for c in s if c.isalpha()}

    return {ch:ord(ch) for ch in set(s) if ch.isalpha()} if s else None
